entry.title: Brave Adds Solana Support and Ramp Wallet Functionality in Latest Browser Update
entry.summary: Brave is making crypto easier to buy through its wallet feature.

entry.title: Coinbase Becomes First Bitcoin Company Among Fortune 500
entry.summary: Coinbase ranked second overall in revenue growth among companies on the list, at 514%, trailing only Moderna.

entry.title: WeWork Founder Raises $70M for Carbon Credit Crypto Project, a16z Leads Round
entry.summary: Adam Neumann, the controversial founder of WeWork, is back with a new crypto startup that will offer a token tied to carbon offsets.

entry.title: Crypto Poses Risk to Financial Stability in ‘Present Trajectory’: ECB
entry.summary: Europe’s central bank has just released its latest outlook on crypto’s risk to financial stability. Its conclusion? Change needs to happen.

entry.title: Boss Cat Rocket Club Builds First All-Inclusive Metaverse on Cardano
entry.summary: NFT PFP collection Boss Cat Rocket Club (BCRC) is inviting other crypto-powered projects into its play-to-earn metaverse.

entry.title: Common Raises $20M to Build DAO Management Platform, Launch Token
entry.summary: Common’s investors include BitDAO, Spark Capital, and Jump.

entry.title: South Korean Crypto Exchanges to Face Closer Supervision Following Terra Collapse
entry.summary: Cryptocurrency exchanges should be held legally accountable for violating anti-money laundering and investor protection rules, according to a Korean government official.

entry.title: Crypto Could Use More Centralization: DraftKings CEO
entry.summary: Jason Robins, an avid crypto and NFT holder, shared his thoughts on how the industry might become accessible to more people on the new gm podcast.

entry.title: Guggenheim CIO Scott Minerd Is Back With Another Bitcoin Price Prediction
entry.summary: In December 2020, Minerd said Bitcoin "should be worth about $400,000." Now, the Guggenheim CIO pins $8,000 as the new target.

entry.title: Metaverse, NFT Tokens Take Hit as Crypto Market Battles Bears
entry.summary: Cryptocurrencies linked to blockchain gaming projects including SAND, AXS, MANA, and GALA have shed at least 8% today.

entry.title: Unbacked Stablecoins Risk 'Blowing Up in Your Face': IMF
entry.summary: People should distinguish between stablecoins backed by hard currencies like the dollar and those like TerraUSD, according to the IMF’s top official.

entry.title: Pharma Bro Martin Shkreli: Ethereum’s Vitalik Buterin 'Brilliant' But Also 'Full of Shit'
entry.summary: Fresh out of prison, the polarizing former pharmaceutical executive has no shortage of opinions about the crypto industry.

entry.title: FTX Has Held Acquisition Talks With Webull, Apex, Public.com: Report
entry.summary: FTX's U.S. arm previously acquired crypto derivatives trading platform LedgerX in August of last year.

entry.title: Disgraced GOP Rep Faces House Investigation Over 'Let's Go Brandon' Coin
entry.summary: Rep. Madison Cawthorn is in still more trouble, this time as a result of his alleged involvement in a pump-and-dump token.

entry.title: Magic Johnson Launches NFT Collection on NBA Top Shot
entry.summary: The collection will consist of 1,600 NFT packs featuring moments from his career.

entry.title: French Luxury Brand Balenciaga to Accept Bitcoin, Ethereum as Payment
entry.summary: The luxury fashion brand is also privately designing a long-term metaverse business strategy.

entry.title: EBay Launches Wayne Gretzky NFTs on Polygon
entry.summary: The e-commerce giant is testing the NFT waters with digital hockey collectibles.

entry.title: Fed Finds Unbanked Americans Are Turning to Crypto at a Higher Rate
entry.summary: 12% of Americans bought or used cryptocurrency in 2021, according to the U.S. Federal Reserve's annual survey on financial well-being.

entry.title: Bear Markets Are for Building the Metaverse
entry.summary: The history of finance—and of crypto—shows much of the most important building takes place during downturns.

entry.title: Ethereum Name Service Hits All-Time High in Monthly Revenue—And May’s Not Over
entry.summary: Besides raking in more than $8 million in revenue, Ethereum Name Service has seen record-breaking metrics across the board.

entry.title: Grayscale Wants You to Convince the SEC to Approve Its Bitcoin Spot ETF
entry.summary: On July 6, the SEC will say whether it has approved Grayscale's application to turn its flagship Bitcoin Trust into a spot ETF.

entry.title: Bitcoin Reclaims $30,000 as Mining Difficulty Set to Adjust This Week
entry.summary: After hitting an all-time high earlier this month, Bitcoin's mining difficulty is now set to drop amid bearish investor sentiment.

entry.title: European Central Bank Chief: Crypto Assets ‘Worth Nothing’
entry.summary: In a televised appearance last night, ECB head Christine Lagarde emphasized the need for crypto regulation and an EU digital currency.

entry.title: GameStop Rolls Out MetaMask-like Ethereum Wallet to Support NFT Marketplace
entry.summary: Meme stock company GameStop has launched a new crypto wallet to accompany its upcoming NFT marketplace.

entry.title: Fantom Rallies 12% Amid Speculation of Andre Cronje Returning to DeFi
entry.summary: As the broader crypto market turns green, Fantom (FTM) is among the top gainers with a 12% spike in price over the last day.

entry.title: Do Kwon Isn’t Done Yet
entry.summary: Terra’s collapse may have silenced some of the trash talking, but Do Kwon isn't going away—he insists he plans to rebuild.

entry.title: Pharrell Williams: Web3 Is ‘Scaring the System’
entry.summary: At VeeCon, the musician described how he sees blockchain technology changing the world for the better.

entry.title: NFT Artist Beeple's Twitter Account Hacked in Phishing Scam
entry.summary: The account temporarily was linked to a dodgy website that stole more than $70,000 in crypto.

entry.title: India’s Cryptocurrency Sector Needs ‘Peace’ and ‘Certainty’: CoinSwitch CEO
entry.summary: The leader of India’s largest cryptocurrency platform wants clear regulations that benefit both companies and investors.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Terra Conspiracy Theories Swirl as All Eyes Turn to Do Kwon
entry.summary: After Terra’s historic collapse, many accused Do Kwon of foul play. He’s stood his ground this week and won back some support.

entry.title: What’s a Web3 Project Really Worth? Here’s How to Tell.
entry.summary: Web3 startups are a new kind of company—and there are new ways to value them.

entry.title: We're Ready for the Metaverse but the Technology Is Not. Here's Why.
entry.summary: The metaverse is coming, but the limits of current technology means it's at least a decade away from achieving its full promise.

entry.title: Terra Crashed Spectacularly. Here's How It Launched.
entry.summary: It took four years for Terraform labs to grow as big as it did, with key moments along the way.

entry.title: 'Pharma Bro' Martin Shkreli: 'I Started Using Uniswap in Prison'
entry.summary: The convicted felon also shared his thoughts on DeFi and various coins.

entry.title: CZ Recommends Diversifying Investments Even Though He's 'All in' Crypto and Bitcoin
entry.summary: Changpeng Zhao isn't your typical investor.

entry.title: Why Maker's DAI Is Surviving Even After Collapse of Terra's Decentralized Stablecoin
entry.summary: Last week's stablecoin failures were the talk of the town, with UST biting the dust and USDT also briefly losing its dollar peg. Not DAI.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Market Freefall Slows, Universal Music Partners With LimeWire, G7 Seeks Regulation
entry.summary: While last week’s market crash resulted in severe liquidations, a two-month decline appears to be ending.

entry.title: Think Sports Will Back Away From Crypto and NFTs Because of the Crash? Think Again.
entry.summary: At a gathering this week of the most powerful people in the sports business, attendees were more crypto-curious than ever.

entry.title: Spike Lee on Using NFTs to Fund Films: 'The Horse Is Out the Barn'
entry.summary: The storied filmmaker speaks with Decrypt about his new Mars Blackmon NFTs and how Web3 can disrupt traditional film financing.

entry.title: House Bill Aims to Protect Bitcoin Retirement Accounts From Federal Ban
entry.summary: The new bill would block any attempts by the Department of Labor to restrict access to Bitcoin in 401(k) plans.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What is Web3?
entry.summary: Web3 is the next evolution of the Internet, built on blockchains. Blockchains are a new kind of database, making new types of peer-to-peer apps possible. This has profound implications for humanity.

entry.title: How Brands Are Creating Immersive Experiences in the Metaverse
entry.summary: In Episode 10 of the Navigating the Metaverse podcast, hosted by Cathy Hackl and Tommaso di Bartolo, Andrew Hayward of Decrypt and Josh Roth of Decrypt Studios discuss how companies are approaching the metaverse, where it could all go next, and what it was like to watch a movie in a Lamborghini on the moon.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto crash roundtable
entry.summary: Crypto bloodbath! How low will the major coins go, and what about Terra and stablecoins? Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Jeff Benson, Stacy Elliott and Jason Nelson will discuss the news and parse through what’s happened and what might happen next.

entry.title: Infura Co-Founder E.G. Galano Talks Otherside NFT Mint, Ethereum Gas Fees
entry.summary: Infura co-founder and general manager E.G. Galano talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what Infura does, how the Bored Ape Yacht Club could have avoided the hiccups with its Otherdeed NFT mint, other hot NFT collections like Moonbirds, and Ethereum's gas fee issues.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is Ethereum 2.0? Ethereum's Consensus Layer and Merge Explained
entry.summary: The long-planned upgrade to Ethereum aims to improve the network’s scalability and security by switching to a proof of stake consensus mechanism.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 9: Jesse Powell Releases the Kraken
entry.summary: Kraken was one of the earliest Bitcoin exchanges, and also made waves for its strong-willed reactions to regulatory changes. CEO Jesse Powell joined the gm podcast to talk to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about Kraken's evolution, the killer use case for NFTs, and how San Francisco's tech scene has changed.

entry.title: Inside the Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Restaurant in L.A.
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin interviews Kevin Seo, co-founder of Bored & Hungry, the BAYC-inspired burger joint in Los Angeles. Video shot and edited by Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 8: All About Avalanche with John Wu
entry.summary: Ava Labs president John Wu talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the meteoric rise of so-called "Ethereum killer" Avalanche (he hates that phrase), its utility and usability, AVAX token, tribalism in crypto, the SEC and regulation, and NFT backlash.
